scripts.build:css:all: postcss assets/css/src/main.css -o assets/css/dist/main.css && postcss assets/css/src/concept.css -o assets/css/dist/concept.css && postcss assets/css/src/menu.css -o assets/css/dist/menu.css && postcss assets/css/src/about.css -o assets/css/dist/about.css && postcss assets/css/src/news.css -o assets/css/dist/news.css && postcss assets/css/src/gallery.css -o assets/css/dist/gallery.css && postcss assets/css/src/faq.css -o assets/css/dist/faq.css && postcss assets/css/src/tophair-salon.css -o assets/css/dist/tophair-salon.css
scripts.watch:css:all: postcss assets/css/src/main.css -o assets/css/dist/main.css --watch & postcss assets/css/src/concept.css -o assets/css/dist/concept.css --watch & postcss assets/css/src/menu.css -o assets/css/dist/menu.css --watch & postcss assets/css/src/about.css -o assets/css/dist/about.css --watch & postcss assets/css/src/news.css -o assets/css/dist/news.css --watch & postcss assets/css/src/gallery.css -o assets/css/dist/gallery.css --watch & postcss assets/css/src/faq.css -o assets/css/dist/faq.css --watch & postcss assets/css/src/tophair-salon.css -o assets/css/dist/tophair-salon.css --watch
